National Temple  ahụ bụ ebe ofufe dị n'ebe mgbakọ nke The Apostolic Church Nigeria dị na Olorunda-Ketu, Lagos State
N'afọ 1969, a kwagara Nzukọ Lagos, Western and Northern Areas (LAWNA) nke a na-emekarị na Ebute Metta na Orishigun, obodo dị na Ketu n'ihi ọnụ ọgụgụ na-arịwanye elu nke ndị a tọghatara
N'afọ 1970, a kwagara Nzukọ ahụ n'ebe dị ugbu a na Olorunda-Ketu na Nzukọ Nzukọ kwa afọ nke 1976 malitere ime n'ihe a maara ugbu a dị ka Old Convention House
N'afọ 1979, onye isi oche mbụ nke LAWNA Territorial, onye ụkọchukwu S
Adegboyega tọrọ ntọala nke ihe ga-abụ Ụlọ Nsọ Mba
N'afọ 1994, onye ụkọchukwu Samuel Jemigbon mere ọganihu ngwa ngwa n'iwu ihe owuwu ahụ n'oge ọ bụ onye isi oche nke atọ nke LAWNA Territorial.

E wuchara Ụlọ Nsọ National Temple ahụ na 19 Nọvemba 2011 n'okpuru ọzụzụ nke Pastor Gabriel Olutola onye kọwara ya dị ka "Ụlọ e ji ekpere wuo" na "ihe nnọchianya nke ịdị n'otu nke ụka". Ọ nwere ikike nke 100,000 oche.
